Class ReviewsTest

java.lang.Object
database.BaseDatabaseTest
database.tests.ReviewsTest
@TestMethodOrder(org.junit.jupiter.api.MethodOrderer.OrderAnnotation.class) public class ReviewsTest extends BaseDatabaseTest
Unit tests for the Reviews repository.

This test class verifies various operations performed on the Reviews repository, including creation, retrieval, updating, deletion, and fetching reviewers sorted by rating.

It interacts with the Users repository to ensure user relationships are properly established before conducting review-related tests.

Author:
Dhruv
